name: @taqueria/flextesa-manager
description: Provides an interface and abstraction over a flextesa mininet

scripts.build-docker: npm config set script-shell $(which bash); source ../bin/set-vars.sh; docker build . -t "ghcr.io/ecadlabs/taqueria-flextesa:${TAQ_VERSION}-${BUILD}"
scripts.build-docker-debug: npm config set script-shell $(which bash); ls ../bin; source ../bin/set-vars.sh; echo "Environment variable from NPM script: TAQUERIA_VERSION ${TAQ_VERSION}"; echo "Environment variable from NPM script: BUILD: ${BUILD}"
scripts.build-all: npm run build-package && npm run build-docker

author: ECAD Labs
